questions: 1. Can you explain the difference between unit testing and integration testing? How do you determine which type of testing to use in a specific scenario? 2. In your experience, how have you utilized automation tools to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of testing processes in a software development project? 3. How do you approach identifying and prioritizing test cases for a given feature or functionality in a software application? Can you walk us through your test planning and execution process as an SDET Engineer?
follow_up: Can you give an example of a time when you had to troubleshoot a particularly complex bug in a software application? Walk me through the steps you took to identify and resolve the issue.

questions: 1. Can you explain the difference between unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing? How do these types of testing fit into the software development lifecycle? 2. How would you approach testing a complex, multi-tiered application that relies on external APIs and third-party services for functionality? What are some common challenges you might encounter in this scenario, and how would you address them? 3. In an Agile development environment, how do you ensure that test automation is integrated effectively into the CI/CD pipeline? What tools and techniques do you recommend for maintaining a reliable and efficient test automation process?
follow_up: Can you provide an example of a particularly challenging test automation problem you have faced in the past and how you successfully resolved it?

questions: 1. Can you explain the difference between black box testing and white box testing, and provide examples of when each testing method would be most beneficial in a software testing process? 2. How would you approach designing and implementing an automated testing framework for a web-based application? What tools and technologies would you recommend using, and why? 3. In your experience, what are some common challenges you have encountered when dealing with test automation in an Agile development environment, and how have you overcome these obstacles to ensure the successful delivery of quality software products?
follow_up: Can you walk us through a specific scenario where you had to troubleshoot a complex technical issue and explain the steps you took to identify and resolve the problem?
